title: lanasharine
author: lanasharine
content: Dear potential investor,We have an exciting opportunity to share with you! We are seeking an investor to support our revolutionary cryptocurrency project. Your investment will play a crucial role in our advertising strategy, as it will be directly used to fund our promotional campaigns.By investing in our project, you will enjoy multiple benefits. Firstly, you will earn a 15% commission on each sale of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) linked to our cryptocurrency. These NFTs represent valuable assets within our ecosystem and are highly sought after by collectors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts.But that's not all! You will also be rewarded with cryptocurrency in addition to your profits from NFT sales. Our project offers exponential growth opportunities, which means your initial investment could potentially be tripled, allowing you to achieve significant financial gains.Furthermore, we invite you to join our team and actively participate in the ongoing development of the project. Your ideas, skills, and experience will be highly valued. You will have the opportunity to contribute to strategic decision-making and positively influence the future of our revolutionary cryptocurrency.We are seeking an investment of 20 Ethereum, but we are open to discussions regarding different amounts based on your preferences. We firmly believe in the value of our project and its potential for success in the market.To obtain more detailed information and discuss the opportunities available to you, please do not hesitate to contact me now. Together, we can achieve great things and reap the exceptional benefits offered by our revolutionary cryptocurrency project.Sincerely,

comments.author: lanasharine
comments.body: Are investors all cautious? This investment will be the most profitable of your life because the project is incredible.Your investment is secure! how ?You will participate in the project and it is you who will directly pay the advertising costs to make the project appear on the major crypto media.Profitability could allow you to earn more than 3 times the amount invested in record time (from a few days to a few weeks).In addition, you will receive millions of cryptocurrency tokens in rewards that could make you a millionaire as soon as the project takes off.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 24, 2023, 07:58:40 PMBy investing in our project, you will enjoy multiple benefits. Firstly, you will earn a 15% commission on each sale of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) linked to our cryptocurrency. These NFTs represent valuable assets within our ecosystem and are highly sought after by collectors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts.If the NFTs are valuable assets and highly sought after by collectors then why don't you just put them up in NFT marketplaces and sell them off to raise funds?I believe you could raise the 20 ETH within a day, right?Quote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 11:10:20 AMAre investors all cautious? Because very few can fall for such stories and fantasies here. Members know where to put their hard-earned money.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 24, 2023, 07:58:40 PMDear potential investor,We have an exciting opportunity to share with you! We are seeking an investor to support our revolutionary cryptocurrency project. Your investment will play a crucial role in our advertising strategy, as it will be directly used to fund our promotional campaigns.I highlight what you think about your project  our revolutionary cryptocurrency project is it really, how come, I stay away from projects that use these words it's deceptive and will get people disappointed because it did not live up to expectation.QuoteBy investing in our project, you will enjoy multiple benefits. Firstly, you will earn a 15% commission on each sale of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) linked to our cryptocurrency. These NFTs represent valuable assets within our ecosystem and are highly sought after by collectors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts.See, what's revolutionary about this some, developers are good at making you excited but I don't think the word revolutionary connects to this projectQuoteWe are seeking an investment of 20 Ethereum, but we are open to discussions regarding different amounts based on your preferences. We firmly believe in the value of our project and its potential for success in the market.To obtain more detailed information and discuss the opportunities available to you, please do not hesitate to contact me now. Together, we can achieve great things and reap the exceptional benefits offered by our revolutionary cryptocurrency project.This Quotecontact me for more information  is so used up by these developers, so they can continue dropping their empty promises, if your project is really revolutionary and you are proud of it post your website, or if there is no website yet your telegram group at least.Investors should learn that whenever a developer is using shilling in their project you should have a second thought and should not be easily deceived, remember they are asking for money so they are using sugar-coated words.

comments.author: lanasharine
comments.body: Sirs,to sell nfts it is not enough to create beautiful images or to have a beautiful project, it is necessary above all to give visibility to the project.Successful nfts projects are high-profile projects (press articles, advertising). Today to sell nfts you have to be visible on the media specializing in nft and cryptocurrency. Press articles are not free as well as advertising in the form of banners.For this reason we are looking for 1 to 2 investors to invest in advertising and make the project visible.Investors will receive a percentage annuity on each sale of nfts to guarantee them a return on investment of at least 3 times.In exchange for their help, they will also receive cryptocurrency that will allow them to become millionaires as soon as the project takes off.The project is big and with an investment of only 10 to 20 ethereum investors will be able to make an incredibly profitable investment.I would like to point out that the investors will participate in the project which is 100% decentralized and at no time will they have to send all of their ethereum to a wallet.Their investment will consist of paying the advertising bills directly to the media!Do not hesitate to send me a message if you have the necessary funds to invest. I will send you the information on the project.Together we will do great things!

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 27, 2023, 12:19:00 PMI would like to point out that the investors will participate in the project which is 100% decentralized and at no time will they have to send all of their ethereum to a wallet.Their investment will consist of paying the advertising bills directly to the media!Do not hesitate to send me a message if you have the necessary funds to invest. I will send you the information on the project.So if the investment will go to the media what will they pay media for where is that trailblazing revolutionary platform you are talking about  , before we talk about visibility show us something first, investors want to see if your revolutionary and trailblazing project   is really worth the name.And if it's really revolutionary and trailblazing   there are some media that will cover it for free in exchange for promoting something great.

comments.author: lanasharine
comments.body: thank you all for your messages which made it possible to place the post first and to find the investors sought.I will give you news of the launch of the project by private message.

comments.author: kingvirtus09
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 26, 2023, 09:41:43 PMQuote from: lanasharine on June 24, 2023, 07:58:40 PMBy investing in our project, you will enjoy multiple benefits. Firstly, you will earn a 15% commission on each sale of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) linked to our cryptocurrency. These NFTs represent valuable assets within our ecosystem and are highly sought after by collectors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts.If the NFTs are valuable assets and highly sought after by collectors then why don't you just put them up in NFT marketplaces and sell them off to raise funds?I believe you could raise the 20 ETH within a day, right?Quote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 11:10:20 AMAre investors all cautious? Because very few can fall for such stories and fantasies here. Members know where to put their hard-earned money.Of course, we do have an NFT marketplace which is actually even easier and they don't have to do any more hassle because all their gonna do is just post the NFT's they got moreover maybe the 20 ETH will only be there for a while and will be sold immediately.Therefore, Instead of them posting here just to find buyers for their NFT. You said it right and you actually have a bit of a point too here.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 24, 2023, 07:58:40 PMFirstly, you will earn a 15% commission on each sale of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) linked to our cryptocurrency. These NFTs represent valuable assets within our ecosystem and are highly sought after by collectors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts.Is it possible to prove that your NFT collection is really popular among collectors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts? Otherwise, this is the most common model for promoting random images.QuoteInvestors will receive a percentage annuity on each sale of nfts to guarantee them a return on investment of at least 3 times.I would like to hear more about these guarantees. On what basis do you claim this, especially during the bear market and the obvious decline in interest in NFTs?

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: The thing here is when someone hears the word NFT, whether potential investors or not. The thought is already there that this space is likely hard to recover so whether you give 15% - 50% or even more for each sale that you make as commission to them, you'll really have hard time finding one that shall find for your advertising. No problem if the NFTs that you'll put up on sale are the popular ones despite the declining NFT market like the BAYC.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 28, 2023, 08:31:56 AMthank you all for your messages which made it possible to place the post first and to find the investors sought.I will give you news of the launch of the project by private message. I'm so surprised that you got yourself investors, after the early posts of members discouraging people from investing, well good luck to them we did warn them, this is shill marketing, imagine using a word like trailblazing as if saying his project is better than Bitcoin if the fund is going to be used in promotional marketing then this is a pump and dump platform, the fund should be on enhancement and upgrading of the platform, a good project is best to promote on word of the mouth coming from investors.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on June 29, 2023, 10:12:45 AMQuote from: lanasharine on June 28, 2023, 08:31:56 AMthank you all for your messages which made it possible to place the post first and to find the investors sought.I will give you news of the launch of the project by private message. I'm so surprised that you got yourself investors, after the early posts of members discouraging people from investing, well good luck to them we did warn them, this is shill marketing, imagine using a word like trailblazing as if saying his project is better than Bitcoin if the fund is going to be used in promotional marketing then this is a pump and dump platform, the fund should be on enhancement and upgrading of the platform, a good project is best to promote on word of the mouth coming from investors.I do not think that he got the investors for his project. I can't say about other social media platforms, but people from bitcointalk are not so dumb to invest in the OP project which has nothing unique to offer. He may have posted this, to get a physiological edge that there are already investors so some people may jump in, after seeing this statement.To the OP, there are many better projects out there to invest in and I don't see anything special about this project. NFT is no longer a buzz word that can bring you investors. I would be waiting when you will write here about the success of this project with proof.
